practice_phrases.known: want to drink
I want to drink
do you want to drink?
want to drink tea
I want to drink coffee
do you want to drink something?

I don't want to drink coffee now
do you want to drink tea or coffee?
I knew you would want to drink something
practice_phrases.target: 我知道你会想喝点什么

practice_phrases.known: something to drink

something to drink now

practice_phrases.target: 我知道孩子们会想喝点什么

practice_phrases.known: something
want something

something to drink
I'd like to tell you something

practice_phrases.target: 我认为我昨天弄坏了点什么

practice_phrases.known: I'm not sure if I want something now
practice_phrases.target: 我不确定我现在想不想要点什么

practice_phrases.known: would you like something to drink or eat?
practice_phrases.target: 你想喝点什么还是吃点什么？
